com.interpss.algo.subAreaNet.impl

Class BaseSubAreaNetProcessorImpl<TBus extends Bus,TBra extends Branch,TSub extends BaseSubArea<?,?,TState>,TState>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.algo.subAreaNet.impl.BaseSubAreaNetProcessorImpl<TBus,TBra,TSub,TState>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubAreaNetProcessor<TBus,TBra,TSub,TState>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SubAreaAcscProcessorImpl, SubAreaPosProcessorImpl, SubNetworkAcscProcessorImpl, SubNetworkPosProcessorImpl

    public abstract class BaseSubAreaNetProcessorImpl<TBus extends Bus,TBra extends Branch,TSub extends BaseSubArea<?,?,TState>,TState>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubAreaNetProcessor<TBus,TBra,TSub,TState>
    Base Class for SubArea processing. It begins by defining a set of cutting branches. It finds SubAreas in the network and SubArea interface buses.

      • processSubAreaNet

        public java.util.List<TSub> processSubAreaNet()
                                       throws InterpssException
        Description copied from interface: SubAreaNetProcessor
        Process SubArea by automatically group buses into SubAreas based on the defined cutting branches set. If it is SubNetwork processing, SubNetwork and the parent Network object relationship will be created. The cutting branches are turn-off after the processing.
        Specified by:
        processSubAreaNet in interface SubAreaNetProcessor<TBus extends Bus,TBra extends Branch,TSub extends BaseSubArea<?,?,TState>,TState>
        Returns:
        the SubArea/Network list
        Throws:
        InterpssException

      • processSubAreaNet

        public java.util.List<TSub> processSubAreaNet(boolean singleSide)
                                       throws InterpssException
        Description copied from interface: SubAreaNetProcessor
        Same processing logic as the processSubAreaNet() method. If SingleSide = true, only process the SubArea side of the network. The SubArea location as follows: When CuttingBranch.splitSide = FromSide fromBus toBus | --- CutBranch ---- | [SubArea] When CuttingBranch.splitSide = ToSide fromBus toBus | --- CutBranch ---- | [SubArea] The cutting branches are turn-off after the processing.
        Specified by:
        processSubAreaNet in interface SubAreaNetProcessor<TBus extends Bus,TBra extends Branch,TSub extends BaseSubArea<?,?,TState>,TState>
        Returns:
        the SubArea/Network list
        Throws:
        InterpssException

                                       throws InterpssException

        Same processing logic as the processSubAreaNet() method. *
        Specified by:
        processSubAreaNet in interface SubAreaNetProcessor<TBus extends Bus,TBra extends Branch,TSub extends BaseSubArea<?,?,TState>,TState>
        setCutBranchStatusTrue - flag to set CutBranch status to True after the processing
